episode_summary: This episode covers a range of fascinating topics, including the bizarre death of a U.S. founding father, gun control in the Wild West, a sunken ship filled with unexploded bombs off the coast of Kent, and Dolly Parton's contribution to a COVID-19 vaccine.

facts.fact: The founding father of the United States of America, Governor Morris, died after sticking a whale bone into his own penis.
Before entering a town in the Wild West, you had to leave your gun outside, pick up a token, and use that token to collect your gun on the way out.
Just off the coast of Kent is a sunken ship, which is under 24-hour surveillance because it contains 14,000 unexploded bombs.
The nine-to-five singer, Dolly Parton, helped fund a COVID vaccine that has a protection rate of ninety-five percent.
